flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, she will do 10 push-ups.
On the second day, she will do 10 + 5 = <<10+5=51>>51 push-ups.
On the third day, she will do 51 + 5 = <<51+5=56>>56 push-ups.
So, Geli will do a total of 10 + 51 + 56 = <<10+51+56=117>>117 push-ups in a week.
#### 117

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
